• Contains performance enhancements and customised settings for iPhone X

• Adds Arrow Touch controls to the iPad and iPhone SE versions of the game.
• Improves the default control settings and adds "Pro" and "Custom" variants for Tilt and Wheel Touch controls.
• Adds an auto-accelerate option for Tilt and Wheel Touch controls.
• Adds an option in the iOS Settings app to disable haptic feedback.
• Improves car handling when using an MFi gamepad.
• Fixes minor graphical issues on multiple tracks.
• Fixes a number of minor issues.
